page.title: 14MR.O'DONOGHUE
page.content:
{Mr.O'Donoghue}was born in{Cork City {Ireland}and lived there for{18yrs.}He had{3 dogs,}Bess, Flash and Judy and{4 {cats, }Sindy, Blacky and{2 called Fluffy.
Before Mr.O'Donoghue became{care-taker at{Mount Pleasant Juniors,}he was a {lumber Jack, core maker,}(pipe maker) a{messenger boy, apple picker, lorry {drivers mate, fish seller}and{wood {seller.
Mr.O'Donoghue{dislikes}the school being{vandalised}and he dislikes {litter}being thrown in the{playground. He likes learning{languages}and playing{snooker}and{pool.}He enjoys {swimming}and{reading.}He said being {married}and having his{family}around him and having{hope}for the{future}by studying the{Bible}made him happy.
